name: Domain Media
tag_list: social-media, online-advertising, relevant-web, digital-distribution-network, integrated-content, consumer-internet
overview:
Domain Media, a growing internet media network of consumer and social media oriented websites, was established in 2008 by Chris Kern. Domain Media offers a rapidly growing network of interconnected websites that cater to particular niches, user communities, products, industries, and interests in what we believe is the emergence of the Relevant Web.

Content is consumed and considered useful and valuable when its engaging and relevant to your interests and current circumstances. We are developing the tools, websites and own the related domain names as the digital real estate to make this a true reality. Our goal is to create niche communities where people can gather, share, learn and have the freedom to express themselves with their like minded peers in a user rich experience of integrated content.
